scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run report
scripts.test:webkit: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=webkit npm test && npm run report
scripts.test:chromium: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=chromium npm test && npm run report
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm test && npm run report
scripts.test:all: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=webkit npm test && npm run report && npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=chromium npm test && npm run report && npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm test && npm run report
scripts.test:parallel: npm run clean && npm-run-all --parallel test:webkit:no-clean test:chromium:no-clean test:firefox:no-clean && npm run report
